data.meanings: to pass by, overlook, transgress, turn aside.. adwun - wickedly, unjustly, spitefully, wrongfully.. adi'yat - companies of warriors, chargers, horses of the warriors, wayfarers who run fast on their journey, swift horses.. aduwatun - enmity. udwan - hostility, injustice. aduwwan (pl. aduwun) - enemy.. . Ya'duuna (impf. 3rd. m. pl.): They transgressed; Programmed.. Laa Ta'du (prt. neg. m. sing.): Do not overlook, not let your eye turn away.. Laa Ta'duu (prt. neg. m. plu.): Do not transgress, violate.. 'Aad (act. pic. m. sing.): Transgressor; Who goes beyond the limits.. 'Aaduuna (act. pic. m. plu.): Transgressors; People who know no limits.. 'Adaytum (prf. 2nd. plu. III.): You are at enmity.. Yat'adda (imp. 3rd. m. sing. V): He trespasses, violates.. I'tadaa (prf. 3rd. m. sing. VIII): Violated.. I'tadan (prf. 3rd. m. plu. VIII.): They transgressed.. I'tadaina (prf. 1st. plu. VIII): We have transgressed.. Ya'taduuna (imp. 3rd. m. plu. VIII): They transgressed.. Ta'taduu (imp. 2nd. m. plu. acc. final Nun dropped): You transgress.. Li Ta'taduu (imp. 2nd. m. plu. el.): That you may transgress.. l'taduu (prt. m. plu.): You punish for violence, punish for transgression.. Laa Ta'taduu (prt. neg. m. plu.): You transgress not.. Mu'tadun (ap-der. m. sing.): Transgressor.. Mu'taduun / Mu'tadiin (acc. ap-der. m. sing.): Transgressor.. 'Adwan (v. n. acc.): Transgressing.. 'Aduwwun / 'Aduwwan (acc. v. n.): Enemy.. A'da'un (n. pl.): Enemies.. 'Udwaanun (v. n.): Violence; Punishment of violence; Harshness; Injustice; Transgression.. 'Adaawatun (v. n.): Enmity.. 'Udwatun (n.): Side; End.. 'Adiyaat (act. pic. f. plu.): Panting; Running; Coursers..
data.sentence: The word وَالْعَادِيَاتِ comes from the root ع د و and is associated with the meanings: to pass by, overlook, transgress, turn aside.. adwun - wickedly, unjustly, spitefully, wrongfully.. adi'yat - companies of warriors, chargers, horses of the warriors, wayfarers who run fast on their journey, swift horses.. aduwatun - enmity. udwan - hostility, injustice. aduwwan (pl. aduwun) - enemy.. . Ya'duuna (impf. 3rd. m. pl.): They transgressed; Programmed.. Laa Ta'du (prt. neg. m. sing.): Do not overlook, not let your eye turn away.. Laa Ta'duu (prt. neg. m. plu.): Do not transgress, violate.. 'Aad (act. pic. m. sing.): Transgressor; Who goes beyond the limits.. 'Aaduuna (act. pic. m. plu.): Transgressors; People who know no limits.. 'Adaytum (prf. 2nd. plu. III.): You are at enmity.. Yat'adda (imp. 3rd. m. sing. V): He trespasses, violates.. I'tadaa (prf. 3rd. m. sing. VIII): Violated.. I'tadan (prf. 3rd. m. plu. VIII.): They transgressed.. I'tadaina (prf. 1st. plu. VIII): We have transgressed.. Ya'taduuna (imp. 3rd. m. plu. VIII): They transgressed.. Ta'taduu (imp. 2nd. m. plu. acc. final Nun dropped): You transgress.. Li Ta'taduu (imp. 2nd. m. plu. el.): That you may transgress.. l'taduu (prt. m. plu.): You punish for violence, punish for transgression.. Laa Ta'taduu (prt. neg. m. plu.): You transgress not.. Mu'tadun (ap-der. m. sing.): Transgressor.. Mu'taduun / Mu'tadiin (acc. ap-der. m. sing.): Transgressor.. 'Adwan (v. n. acc.): Transgressing.. 'Aduwwun / 'Aduwwan (acc. v. n.): Enemy.. A'da'un (n. pl.): Enemies.. 'Udwaanun (v. n.): Violence; Punishment of violence; Harshness; Injustice; Transgression.. 'Adaawatun (v. n.): Enmity.. 'Udwatun (n.): Side; End.. 'Adiyaat (act. pic. f. plu.): Panting; Running; Coursers..

data.meanings: to pant, breathe in running (horses), snore, yelp, snorting, the act of panting and soaring, cried out, raising the voice in reading.
data.sentence: The word ضَبْحًا comes from the root ض ب ح and is associated with the meanings: to pant, breathe in running (horses), snore, yelp, snorting, the act of panting and soaring, cried out, raising the voice in reading.
